rules_text:
When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
Whenever one or more Insects you control attack, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“With her, we only had one rule. Power. Come to us, and we will show you equality.”[/i]
